Reviews.Title: Loves it
Reviews.Author: Essohanam Essizewa "E.E"
Reviews.Content: I bought it and i like it.Fits any place and easy to carry.Working well and so far no issues with it.

Reviews.Title: Samsung C3050
Reviews.Author: C.H. Cartwright
Reviews.Content: My phone arrived on expected date. I love my phone so far. As soon as I received it, I inserted my Philippine roaming sim card right away and it works.

Reviews.Title: nice cell phone
Reviews.Author: zhicheng jiang
Reviews.Content: the phone is easy to use once i have got use to itreasonable sized screenThe camera produces good quality picturesmemory is goodreception and clarity of call is excellant
